title: Immortal Gaming LFM
body:
My Ign is SeethingSin i am diamond 5 this season

I am looking for diamond level players to trial them. My vision is to later on be able to compete in xfire tournaments and open ladder. People who join must go through trial and must display a good personality that is worthy for high tier play. Like communicating, able to talk about what should of been better and be able to take criticism.

My have either skype or Curse. I would love for them to have facebook as well.



Trials will be organised as soon as we have 5. 

Positions taken:

Support is only taken all!


Other roles for the time being are open!
